title: Map Sampler, 1796
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, running, and couching stitches on plain weave foundation
inscribed: A new map of the world with the late discoveries in the southern seas worked by Eliza Thompson 1796
description: Two hemispheres containing maps of the world with a medallion at top reading "A new map of the world with the late discoveries in the southern seas worked by Eliza Thompson 1796."  At bottom is a compass.  Continents are outlined with chenille thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Map Sampler, 1796.
1796. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, running, and couching stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-121.
